caller_intent: The caller (Taylor) wants to add a new home in Minnesota to their existing Travelers policy in North Carolina but is confused about whether Alliance Insurance Services can handle this and how to proceed.
resolution_steps: Agent Crystal clarifies that the Minnesota home cannot be added to the existing policy but can have its own separate policy with a multi-policy discount if both policies are with Travelers.
Crystal requests the Minnesota zip code (55416) to find a local agent.
Crystal identifies Dyste Agency (nearby in Minnesota) and provides contact details (phone number, address).
Crystal offers an alternative agent option: Brown and Brown Insurance Services.
knowledge_required: Travelers' policy bundling rules and multi-policy discount eligibility
Process for connecting customers with local agents in different states
Travelers' agent directory and location-based agent matching
summary: Taylor sought to add a Minnesota home to their existing Travelers policy but faced conflicting guidance from their agent (Alliance). Crystal clarified that a separate policy would be needed for Minnesota, explained multi-policy discount eligibility, and connected Taylor with local Minnesota agents (Dyste Agency and Brown and Brown Insurance Services) to proceed.
